ongoing.name: Mobius
ongoing.p1: Mobius closes the gap between the internet world and blockchain world through innovative and simple protocols that introduce new standards for cross-blockchain login, payment, governance, and oracles.
ongoing.p1_cn: Mobius是一个跨链支付解决方案。包括一套跨链通用协议API和DApp Store。
ongoing.p2: Due to unprecedentd demand the Mobius Token is sold out and the pre-sale is closed. The public sale will start on Nov 8.
ongoing.p2_cn: 预售被意料之外的需求包圆了。下一轮公开出售将在11月8日进行。

ongoing.name: E-GIFT Card
ongoing.p1: GFT is an asset based on the Stellar blockchain. Each gift card is backed by US dollars and contains the equivalent amount of the GFT tokens (i.e. 1 GFT = 1 USD).
ongoing.p1_cn: GFT是基于恒星的电子礼品卡。每个GFT都相当于1美元的礼品卡。
ongoing.p2: Promotional presale ends Aug 25. 75% OFF for 3M GFT.
ongoing.p2_cn: 预售将持续到8月25日。将以2.5折出售3百万GFT。

ongoing.name: Smartlands
ongoing.p1: Smartlands platform is designed to create a new class of low-risk future-proof tokens, secured by real, profitable assets in agriculture.
ongoing.p1_cn: Smartlands平台计划做一个低成本的长期的农业代币，具体介绍看他们网站。
ongoing.p2: Total supply 100,000,000 SLT. ICO last 15 days.
